hero.name: Paolo Pepito
hero.middleText: I build mobile, web and desktop apps
hero.bottomText:
I am a full-stack software engineer with the passion and skills for creating beautiful and seamless user 
experiences may it be for mobile, web or desktop. Hit me up and let's build something great together!
